pr_title: xds: refactor AdsStream to envoy-proto-and-version-agnostic AbstractAdsStream

timeline.message: xds: refactor AdsStream to envoy proto agnostic AbstractAdsStream

timeline.bodyText: Wrong log. The actual one should have already been logged. Same for the v3 class.
timeline.author: voidzcy

replies.bodyText: Good catch. Hmm.. it's quite annoying for the logging. We need log the versioned proto message actually being sent out, so we are not able to log it inside send{Xds,Ack,Nack}Request(DiscoveryRequestData).
replies.author: dapengzhang0

replies.bodyText: I mean you can just log in the method sendXdsRequest/sendAckRequest/sendNackRequest after the line of calling sendDiscoveryRequest.
replies.author: voidzcy

replies.bodyText:
just log in the method sendXdsRequest/sendAckRequest/sendNackRequest after the line of calling sendDiscoveryRequest.

Here we want to log the actual proto message sent out. Inside send{Xds,Ack,Nack}Request(DiscoveryRequestData), you can only log DiscoveryRequestData.toString() (which is not necessary, because most of the data was already logged in sendXdsRequest "Sending XXX request for resources: {0}"), unless sendDiscoveryRequest returns the proto message.
replies.author: dapengzhang0

replies.bodyText: You can have one log message in sendAckRequest/sendNackRequest indicating if the request is ACK or NACK. Then another log message just with the proto without description in sendDiscoveryRequest. Do not add the AckType enum, it complicates things for little gain.
replies.author: voidzcy

replies.bodyText:
Can you preserve the messages:
"Sending ACK/NACK"
proto

Most people are eyeballing for "ACK" or "NACK" keywords.
replies.author: voidzcy

timeline.bodyText: nit: Builder may not be necessary given the usage is private. But up to you.
timeline.author: voidzcy

timeline.message: log message just with the proto without description in sendDiscoveryRequest

timeline.bodyText: Ah, I mean the whole Builder with setters are not necessary, can just use the constructor.
timeline.author: voidzcy

replies.bodyText: I understand. Will do the removal in upcoming commit.
replies.author: dapengzhang0
